text: ohu (ibrāhīm) samaga ævida yana viyaṭa ohu ḷan̆gā vū kalhi, “ahō māgē putaṇuvani! niyata vaśayenma mama obagē gela sin̆da damannāk men sihinayak duṭuvemi. eheyin (ē gæna) oba adahas karanuyē kumakdæyi balanu.” yæyi kīha. “ahō māgē piyāṇeni! obaṭa aṇa karanu labana dǣ oba sidu karanu. allāhgē abhimataya paridi oba mā ivasilivantayin aturin dæka ganu ætæyi” ohu (putu) pævasīya
